p: The silica particles do degrade into silicic acid (Si(OH) 4, pKa 9.6) in biological media by dissolution. Silicic acid is soluble in water and consists on the dominant silicon species at low concentration (< 2 x 10 -3 M) ( 96). It is also excreted through the urine and its good bioavailability even contributes to maintaining bone health ( 88, 96).
